root.name: MotoGP 10/11
root.description: Yearly updates to the game were promised at launch. This would include team changes, most notably Valentino Rossi switching from the Yamaha factory team to the Ducati Factory Team. Due to a poor reception and mediocre sales the free updates and DLC have not been added despite the 2011 MotoGP season being complete. This has been a common theme throughout all of Capcom's MotoGP games.
